extendedInfo.description: Shortbeam lets you put your favorite media (video, music, photos) to your TV â without any extra hardware! For free â no frills, no hidden costs!Shortbeam is easy:    Download the app for free.    Open the app & choose the content youÂ´d like to see on the TV screen.    Lay back & enjoy!NOTE: Shortbeam requires a TV screen or audio player which uses the same WiFi or internet connection as your Android smartphone. Check for "Connected TV" or "DLNA / UPnP".**************************CURRENTLY WORKS WITHâ¦    TV sets: Samsung, LG, Sharp, Sony, Panasonic (Viera)    Audio/Music Player: NOXON, AwoxHomeDia, Digital Living Network Alliance, DLNA, DMP, DMC, DMS, player, controller, server, media player, UPnP, multimedia, airplay, imediashare, BubbleUPnP, plex, channel, eminent, air, play, EML, control, point, netfront, life, connect, allshare, remote, airbubble, doubletwist, amediacontrol, hd, share, cloud, receiver, center, nettv, smarttv, connectedtv, smart tv, connected tv, net tv, skifta, send to tv, send2tv, play on tv, home multimedia center, plex, twonkey, play on big screen, second screen, swipeit, swipe it, vimeo, zappotv, zappo tv,mobile media center, zapstreak, showcase, lg tv, sony tv, wd tv, xbmc, samsung tv, send to tv, short, beam****************************************Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/shortbeamFollow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/shortbeamCircle & plus us on Google+: http://bit.ly/shortbeamVisit us on www.shortbeam.com****************************************HELP AND SUPPORTDo you have any questions or comments? reviews.comment: Fantastic \'only player ive found that plays avi ect files from tab to tv without disconnecting after 30 mins ish
reviews.author: Philip Buck

reviews.title: Good functionality buy didn\'t with with screen off.
reviews.comment: Needs to work with with screen off. I like the UI except the iPhone elements. Check out the Android design guidelines.
reviews.author: Mike Booth

reviews.title: Works like a charm, but needs work
reviews.comment: Login to YouTube would aid customised discovery. Even the usual videos on the app are US specific.   Biggest plus - doesn\'t drop signal. Played a movie non stop the other day.
reviews.author: Karan Rajpal

reviews.title: Looks professional, but doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: The interface is very slick and I am sure that it would be very intuitive if it worked but neither my sonos or bravia tv will play content (TV flashes as if it will but then doesn\'t).
reviews.author: Joe Fowler

reviews.title: Good doesnt always work
reviews.comment: I have a note 2 and it doesnt always work. I would have to pair my LG tv to it manually all the time even when its on the same wifi. At times it tells me it cant even detect any devices. Disappointing not reliable but awesome when it works smoothly.
reviews.author: Rhea Sabile

reviews.title: Nah, doesn\302\264t work. :(
reviews.comment: Doesn\302\264t work with LG BluRay device (new one with Smart TV) and doesn\302\264t seem to work together with Spotify either.  Nice idea, but simply doesn\302\264t work at all. :(
reviews.author: J. Pingo Lindstrom

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Ability to select media server would be great.
reviews.author: Simon Raymont

reviews.title: Need instructions
reviews.comment: Just installed, could really use some instructions. Trying to access movies downloaded on my p.c. over my  Google t.v. device a rock-chip mk808 mini computer. Every time I exit or go back a page it re-starts my device. Not having fun yet
reviews.author: Mark Kellner

reviews.title: Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: I have something call miniPC or also known as TVstick mine is iMito mx-1. This device converts my TV into a \"smart TV\". I was looking for a free app that would allow me to watch on TV my private photos and videos for freeeeeee! This one does it! (Imediashare lite) asks for $4.00 bucks while this one does not.
reviews.author: Miguel De Zayas

reviews.title: Brill
reviews.comment: Cound not be  without this app I use it every day.my wife and grandson love it,, Many Thanks
reviews.author: michael nash

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Full hd and full screen on both LG and Samsung TVs. Pity it doesn\'t remember the videos from last time. It needs to re-search the mobile.
reviews.author: Ian Fifer

reviews.title: Finally one that works
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy s3 phone and been trying to share it to my lg tv. The first app that\'s worked  and show in hd quality with out any cords. Only my first day using it, but I watched one movie and two tv shows without any probably. I normally don\'t comment on apps but was so please with this one. Try it.
reviews.author: ray bracey

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Brilliant dnt need usb cable as much again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it. It need more user frendly options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tijanisco Starz ....
reviews.comment: The best fon2tv so far,choose any video on youtube n instantly playz on ur tv n the best of it all,u can play all ur media files incl.pics,vidz,music...i give it 5*****
reviews.author: Tijani Sissoko

reviews.title: Ok but
reviews.comment: Good but cannot select other music directory and crashes from time to time
reviews.author: Andy Gravett

reviews.title: At last..
reviews.comment: A simple and effective way to instantly search for and play YouTube videos on my Samsung TV. No fuss, worked in seconds.
reviews.author: David McNiven

reviews.title: Eppiicc
reviews.comment: Funny videos from holiday streamed to t.v. fist app that actually works..
reviews.author: Bob Mihfual

reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: David Stewart

reviews.title: Short beam is easy to use.
reviews.comment: Really good.
